name: Simon the Sorcerer II: The Lion, the Wizard and the Wardrobe
name_original: Simon the Sorcerer II: The Lion, the Wizard and the Wardrobe
description: Simon the Sorcerer II: The Lion, the Wizard and the Wardrobe is an adventure game created by Adventure Soft released in 1995. It is the second in the Simon the Sorcerer series of games.
